title: Trading Performance Dashboard
prompt: Create a comprehensive trading performance dashboard. Header: 'SURGE-WSI Performance' with date range selector. Top row: Four stat cards - 'Total P&L' (+$2,450, green with chart icon), 'Win Rate' (68%, donut chart), 'Profit Factor' (1.85, comparison bar), 'Total Trades' (47, trade icon). Middle row: Large equity curve chart showing account balance over time with drawdown overlay. Bottom left: Trade distribution pie chart by symbol (GBPUSD, EURUSD, etc.). Bottom center: Monthly P&L bar chart (green/red bars). Bottom right: Recent trades table with columns: Date, Symbol, Direction, P&L. Filter buttons: '1W', '1M', '3M', 'YTD'. Dark slate background (#1E293B). Modern analytics dashboard.
negative_prompt: too many charts, cluttered layout, inconsistent card sizes, hard to read numbers
